text: International Online Riichi Mahjong Competition (IORMC/ko:국제온라인마작대회) is the international competition of Mahjong under Japanese rule in Tenhou.net the online mahjong service since 2012. The competition is organized by the Korean Mahjong League (KML). == History == The International Online Riichi Mahjong Competition (IORMC) was originally started as "Korea-Japan Online Mahjong Exchange Match" and "Asian Online Riichi Mahjong Competition" in 2011. == Format == The competition utilizes a simultaneous team round robin. Participants play out a set number of games against each other, while not being matched with players from their own teams. Team scores is a cumulative of all team member scores. A separate competition determines the individual winner, via qualification from the team format.
